item.title: K8s on Vms With Calico
item.description: Updated2 This post is a memo on how I did the installtion of Kubernetes and Calico on VMs. It’s not some best pactrices in anyway. I’ve chose VM because I didn’t want to depend on any Cloud infrastructure. I’ve also wanted to understand the network interaction between K8s parts from an infrastructure point of view. Prerequisite : know how to create VMs on any hypervisors Steps to deploy K8s : Install 1 ubuntu router with 3 interfaces.
